description: not much to say about this place... another King of Thai but slightly better and nicer
author: Cedric F.

description: The food is affordable and tastes good. Service is friendly and fast. My only complaint is that the portions are a little skimpy - don't count on having leftovers.
author: G L.

description: what to say about regent thai?  there is nothing too spectacular or noteworthy about this place.  it is simply a nice neighborhood spot-- perfect for take out.  not the greatest thai food ever, but decent.  and pretty cheap, too.  the staff are friendly and attentive.  if it wasn't right around the corner, i'd never go.  but it is right around the corner, and i'm glad it is there.
author: Samantha W.

description: Love their chicken satay and chicken pad Thai fried rice.
author: Jenny A.

description: By far the best Thai place in Noe Valley and compares well with others around the city.  Very clean with great service.  The Tom Yom Kung is the best I've ever had.  The quality is consistent every time I go.  You can't go wrong here.
author: Anonymou S.

description: Delicious! Order the Tofu Choo Ros as an appetizer. It might not be on the menu, bu they can make it. All the women that work there are super friendly and love kids. The Tofu Pad Ma Kuer is also one of my favorites. The dishes are inexpensive, so order one extra, and then you'll be sure to have enough food.
author: robin c.

description: My favorite Thai place ever. Yummy food - especially the green curry chicken and the tofu gra prao - and excellent prices. Lunch special prices are unbelievably low. Quiet, pleasant atmosphere and some great servers. I love to come here, get a lunch special and a Thai iced tea and read my latest book.
author: Melissa M.

description: Live in the neighborhood and walk over from time to time. The service is always very courteous and attentive. The food is very good. The yellow chicken curry, coconut soup and pork with eggplant all tasty and reasonable priced. This is a clean, pleasant neighborhood restaurant with very good food. Maybe not the best Thai in town but very respectable. I have never been disappointed and will return.
author: Bob J.

description: the tom kai gah was so super good and coconutty! definitely get the large 'cause that little cup will just hit the spot in such a way that it'll have you ordering another :] i was also pleased with the red curry, perfect amount of spice and the flavor was spot on. the portions weren't overly generous, but they were a good size. i wasn't sold on the rice paper wrapped fried shrimp appetizer - it wasn't very crispy and also kinda greasy. all in all, we enjoyed ourselves and we'll be back.
author: Toisha T.

description: this place gets 3 stars sorry but i'm still looking for that great thai place in the neighborhood its just hard to find !!!
author: NAEL K.

description: I've been going to Regent Thai for years and have taken many many friends there who have also always loved it.  I had a great dinner last night there with two friends who had never been and because AGAIN friends loved it so much, I decided to finally write them a review.  It's also very affordable.  We had the Golden Bags (fried lil' curry potato dumplings w/cucumber salad) and Chicken Satay for appetizers. We also had a large bowl of the Tom Kai Soup (chicken and coconut) and my friend said it was the best she's ever had.  Then we had like 3 or 4 dishes and 3 thai iced teas and then two cokes and the bill came out to $63 bucks.  I was again happily suprised at how reasonable the bill was for such a good and plentiful dinner.  I love their double cooked crispy chicken, mas ma nam nuir beer curry, red curry and mostly everything I've ever had there. GOTTA CHECK IT OUT!!!
author: sara w.

description: Good neighborhood takeout, good prices, very fast.  It was not the most flavorful thai food, but it was quite spicy, so that was a big plus!
author: Jessica T.

description: This place is delicious, and the wait staff is courteous and efficient.  I really like the shrimp egg roll appetizers and the duck curry.
author: John C.

description: This place is great. The inside isn't much to look at, but they make fantastic food. We order out from here all the time.
author: Andy F.

description: this place is horrible service sucks. i went there with my girlfriend i told them i wanted a table not to crowded they said no, i didnt want to be rude i just sat down, the service was sooooo horrible theses girls that work here have a big attitude problem, there was no service i kept getting dirty looks from the waitreeses, and 25 mins later i finally get my food i got the hot wings and fried rice my girl got the chicken curry, the food was not even hot it was room temp, i ate about a quarter of it and askd for the check, she gave it to me i put in my credit card and a 4 doller tip even though the place suckd, so another waitress picks up the check the origanal waitress brings it back for me to sign i sign it and walk out the door next thing you knw she follows me outside askin me tip now tip now what was wrng with the service before i could say anything the other lady tells her i tipd. over this is not a place you want to go food is not good service is worst.
author: mike b.

description: the food is flavorful (mostly garlic), the service is fast and friendly, and the price is right. it is a great place for a casual dinner with friends.
author: Mrs B.
